Name: Typeless for iOS
Tagline: AI voice keyboard now on iPhone
Description: Speak naturally, and Typeless for iOS will turn your speech into clear, polished messages, emails, and documents that read like you carefully typed them - in real time. Suddenly, your iPhone can do things that once felt impossible, effortlessly and at 10 times the speed.

Name: GitHired
Tagline: Find your next 10x Engineer by proof of work, not keywords
Description: GitHired lets you create autonomous hiring forms that instantly rank your applicants based on what they've actually built, not what they say they can build. Each candidate gets a one page profile showing their real tech stack usage, project depth and complexity, and contribution activity (while also filtering out fake GitHub commits). Hiring becomes 10x faster and far more accurate. Stop guessing who can code. Start seeing who does.

Name: Launch Shots
Tagline: Create stunning App/Play Store screenshots in minutes
Description: Create beautiful App Store and Play Store screenshots with templates, real device frames, and powerful editing tools. You get 3 free downloads every month, and if you need more, there‚Äôs a simple credit-based plan starting at just $1. And unlike those tools that suddenly hit you with a $25/month subscription the moment you‚Äôre ready to download‚Ä¶ we don‚Äôt do that. Pay only when you actually need it.

Name: WalletWallet
Tagline: Create Apple Wallet passes for unsupported cards
Description: Turn any barcode into a working Apple Wallet pass. Passes are signed with a valid Apple developer certificate and work as expected in Wallet. Works directly from your browser. No data is stored, and it‚Äôs free. 21,000 passes generated since launching on December 22, 2025. Built with costs in mind and hosted on Cloudflare Workers to keep it low-cost, so it won‚Äôt go away or suddenly become monetized.

Name: Lofi Desk
Tagline: Dynamic room & companion that changes based on your music
Description: Struggling to focus? Lofi Desk creates the perfect deep work environment. üéß Dynamic Atmosphere: The room and character react to the music (Cafe, Rain, Retro), keeping you engaged. üçÖ Pomodoro Timer: Built-in customizable timer. Never work alone again.

Name: A2UI
Tagline: A safe way for AI to build UIs your app can render
Topics: Open Source, User Experience, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: A2UI is an open protocol by Google enabling agents to generate rich, interactive UIs. Instead of risky code execution, agents send declarative JSON that clients render natively (Flutter/Web/Mobile). Secure, framework-agnostic, and designed for LLMs.

Name: Voice Studio Companion
Tagline: Drag & drop voice generator tool
Description: Voice Studio Companion is a macOS menu bar app that turns text into professional AI voiceovers using ElevenLabs technology. Ideal for creators and editors, it lets you choose from 20+ high-quality voices and generate audio in seconds. Drag and drop directly into Final Cut Pro, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Logic Pro, GarageBand, Keynote, PowerPoint, and any app that accepts audio files.

Name: Nano Banana Playground
Tagline: Playground for Nano Banana image generation and editing
Description: Try Google‚Äôs Nano Banana Pro image generation and editing model. Supports text-to-image, image editing, multiple aspect ratios, and basic history. The app was built 100% with v0 and is available as a forkable template, so anyone can reuse it to build their own AI image apps in v0.

Name: Vanderwaals: Personalized by AI
Tagline: On‚Äëdevice AI curates wallpapers from your preferences
Description: Vanderwaals uses on-device machine learning to understand your aesthetic preferences and automatically surfaces wallpapers you'll love‚Äîno endless scrolling required. ü§ñ Neural network (100% offline) üîí Zero tracking, zero analytics üìö 3,000+ curated wallpapers from GitHub + Bing ‚ö° Auto-change on unlock/hourly/daily üé® Material 3 with dynamic theming üîì Fully open source (AGPL-3.0) Two modes: Start fresh and let AI learn, or upload one favorite wallpaper for instant similar matches.

Name: GitJin
Tagline: GitHub repos, issues, and PRs in one clear dashboard
Description: A GitHub dashboard for developers. See all your repos, issues, and pull requests in one fast, simple view. Very, Very fast. I think fastest github dashboard in the world. It don't makes your stress when you open. Do you feel hassle picking up repository on Github home or opening PRs, issues? You must try it.

Name: Santa Videos
Tagline: Bring Santa to life with AI
Topics: Artificial Intelligence, Social media marketing, Video
Description: Free personalized videos from Santa to your loved ones. Create your video with a message from Santa using Artificial Intelligence. Something kids can‚Äôt believe when they see it. This Christmas bring Santa magic with AI.

Name: ooml.io
Tagline: Offline-first Loom-like video recording app for macOS
Topics: Mac, GitHub, Menu Bar Apps, Video
Description: ooml.io is a a lightweight, offline-first video recording app for macOS. It lives in the menu bar, starts recording in one click, and saves everything locally on your Mac by default. Offline by default ‚Äî no automatic uploads or cloud storage No accounts or onboarding ‚Äî open it and record immediately Menu bar‚Äìnative design that runs quietly in the background Instead of asking you to adapt to a platform, ooml.io adapts to how you already work ‚Äî fast, private, and out of the way.

Name: ShipAddons
Tagline: Ship Google Workspace add-ons without the setup pain
Description: ShipAddons is a production-ready boilerplate for building Google Workspace add-ons. It solves the hardest parts: authentication, frontend setup, backend wiring, and billing, so you can focus on the actual product. Built with React, Supabase, and Stripe, Typescript, Vite and TailwindCSS.

Name: Spring Boot CRUD Generator
Tagline: Generate production-ready Spring Boot CRUD in seconds
Topics: Productivity, Open Source, Developer Tools, YouTube
Description: Spring Boot CRUD Generator is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that generates production-ready backend layers from a JPA entity in one click. It creates Controllers, Services, Repositories, DTOs, Mappers, pagination, auditing, global exception handling, Swagger/OpenAPI docs, and optional JWT security with role-based access. Built for Java backend developers who want clean architecture without repetitive CRUD boilerplate.

Name: Innovative Blog Tech
Tagline: blogging site
Description: Explore Digital Marketing, Beauty, Fitness, Finance & News at Innovative Blog Tech.

Name: Cinematic Ads with Presets
Tagline: Upload a product image. Pick a style. Get a cinematic ad.
Description: Cinematic Ads with Preset Styles by Gan.AI lets you create high-quality product ads in minutes. Upload a product image, choose a cinematic festive style, and generate a polished ad instantly. No shoots. No editing. Just cinematic ads powered by pre-trained creative intelligence.

Name: UNDERLAIRS
Tagline: Boost your study, productivity & ADHD Support
Description: "There's a lot of lo-fi music timers out there, but why isn't there a music timer with something more intense and immersive?" Well, wait no more! Beast Mode allows unlimited music with no timer. You have access to five distinct playlists (lairs) to choose from. And lastly, there's a beautiful pomodoro timer with intense sound tracks.

Name: MileSnap
Tagline: The polaroid album of your ùïè posts
Description: All the moments of your journey (ùïè posts, milestones, followers, MRR...) and future memories on one page. No algo, no post lost in the feed. You show what YOU want, making your story easier to follow and keeping it alive over time.

Name: HackAI
Tagline: Anyone can Hack with Just Prompt
Description: A gamified red-teaming platform to test and sharpen prompt-engineering skills. Face increasingly paranoid LLMs, exploit their logic, extract system prompts, and earn cash bounties through real-world AI attack scenarios.

Name: Stonks Dashboard
Tagline: Real-time crypto & stock dashboard for your terminal
Topics: Open Source, Fintech, Developer Tools, GitHub
Description: Stonks Dashboard is a TUI (Terminal User Interface) designed for developers who want to track markets without context-switching. It visualizes real-time data for Crypto, Stocks, and ETFs using dynamic ASCII charts. Key features: - Zero-config launch via `npx` - 1D to 90D trend lines - Cyberpunk aesthetic - Smart local caching to avoid API rate limits Built with Node.js, free and open-source.
